activities: Personal information is requested by Bomgar when an individual orders products or services, participates in surveys, or applies for a job at Bomgar.  Bomgar may also collect information during an individual's visit to the Bomgar Network.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: online entered on Bomgar.com by individuals and corporations
recoursemech: TRUSTe; for HR data, we will use the EU data protection authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner for dispute resolution.
